articles.description: Following a slump in the value of Tesla's shares, Musk saw his wealth recede to $137 billion after it peaked in November, 2021, growing to $340 billion.
articles.content: Business magnate Elon Musk was the second person to make a personal fortune of more than $200 billion in January 2021, months after Jeff Bezos.  However, the Tesla CEO has now become the first person… [+1487 chars]
